      • init

        public static Properties init(Server server)
        Load server settings This method can only be called once
        Parameters:
        server - The server to load for
        Returns:
        The Properties object

      • reset

        public static void reset()
        Reset the init value for System Properties

      • save

        public void save(String filename)
          throws IOException
        Save the properties file
        Parameters:
        filename - The file to save it as
        Throws:
        IOException - This is thrown if there's an error saving the file

      • load

        public void load(String filename)
          throws IOException
        Load the properties file. This will reload the settings in memory.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file
        Throws:
        IOException - This is thrown if there's an error reading the file

      • getKeys

        public String[] getKeys()
        Get all the keys this properties file has.
        Returns:
        A String array of keys.

      • getBool

        public boolean getBool(String key)
        Get the boolean value of the setting key
        Parameters:
        key - The setting to lookup
        Returns:
        returns true if the setting equals "true" (regardless of casing) returns false if any other value is found

      • getInt

        public int getInt(String key)
           throws NumberFormatException
        Get the int value of the setting key
        Parameters:
        key - The setting to lookup
        Returns:
        The int value of that setting
        Throws:
        NumberFormatException - If the setting does not contain a number, then a NumberFormatException is thrown

      • hasValue

        public boolean hasValue(String key)
        Whether this properties file has a value for a setting
        Parameters:
        key - The setting to search
        Returns:
        True if it does have a value False if the setting doesnt exist.

      • addComment

        public void addComment(String key,
              String comment)
        Add a comment on top of a setting.
        Parameters:
        key - The setting that the comment will be for.
        comment - The comment to add.

      • getValue

        public String getValue(String key)
        Get the value of the setting key If no setting is found, then "null" will be returned, however, the string value returned WONT be null, the string value returned will equal "null"
        Parameters:
        key - The setting to get
        Returns:
        The value of that setting, if no value is found, then it will return "null"

      • updateSetting

        public void updateSetting(String key,
                 boolean value)
        Change a setting in the properties file This can also be used to add a setting, but its recommended you use addSetting(String, boolean) to add a setting.
        Parameters:
        key - The name of the setting
        value - The new value for this setting

      • updateSetting

        Change a setting in the properties file This can also be used to add a setting, but its recommended you use addSetting(String, int) to add a setting.
        Parameters:
        key - The name of the setting
        value - The new value for this setting

        value - The new value for this setting
